- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  withMonth 

Type Property# withMonth

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withMonth: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withMonth#Discussion)

The date representation includes the month. The format for month is `MM`.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withMonth#see-also)
